mapper.insert: insert into bbs_topic_data (topic_id, topic_reply_count, topic_view_count, topic_favorite_count, topic_title_style, lastest_reply_user, lastest_reply_time, topic_update_user_id, topic_update_user, topic_update_time) values (#{topicId}, #{topicReplyCount}, #{topicViewCount}, #{topicFavoriteCount}, #{topicTitleStyle}, #{lastestReplyUser}, #{lastestReplyTime}, #{topicUpdateUserId}, #{topicUpdateUser}, #{topicUpdateTime})
